entry.content:
1.13

设p:今天星期一 q:明天是星期二 r:明天是星期三
$$
\begin{align}
&(1)p \rightarrow q~~不会出现前句为真后句为假的情况\
&(2)q \rightarrow p不会出现前句为真后句为假的情况\
&(3)p \leftrightarrow q ~~必然为1\
&(4)p \rightarrow r 若p为真，则真值为0;若p为假，则真值为1
\end{align}
$$

1.14

$$
\begin{align}
&(1)p:刘晓月跑的快~~q:刘晓月跳得高~~~p \wedge q \
&(2)p:老王是山东人q:老王是河北人~~~(p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee (\urcorner p \wedge \ q)\
&(3)~p:天气冷q:我穿羽绒服 ~~ p \rightarrow q \
&(4)p:王欢与李乐组成一个小组~~p\
&(5)p:李幸与李末是兄弟p\
&(6)p:王强学过法语 ~~q:刘威学过法语 ~~p \wedge q \
&(7)p:他吃饭 ~~q:他听音乐 ~~p \wedge q \
&(8)p:天下大雨 ~~q:他乘车上班 ~~p \rightarrow q \
&(9)p:天下大雨 ~~q:他乘车上班 ~~q \rightarrow p \
&(10)p:天下大雨 ~~q:他乘车上班 ~~q \rightarrow p \
&(11)p:下雪 ~~q:路滑r:他迟到了 (p \wedge q) \rightarrow r \
&(12)~p:2是素数 ~~q:4是素数\urcorner(p \wedge q) \
&(13)~p:2是素数 q:4是素数\urcorner(\urcorner(p \wedge q)) \
\end{align}
$$

1.15

p真值为1，q真值为1，r真值为0
$$
\begin{align}
&(1)(p \leftrightarrow q) \rightarrow r \
&=(1 \leftrightarrow 1) \rightarrow 0\
&=1 \rightarrow 0\
&=0\
&(2)(r \rightarrow (p \wedge q)) \leftrightarrow \urcorner p\
&=(0 \rightarrow(1 \wedge 1)) \leftrightarrow 0\
&=1 \leftrightarrow 0\
&=0\
&(3)\urcorner r \rightarrow (\urcorner p \vee \urcorner q \vee r )\
&=1 \rightarrow (0 \vee 0 \vee 0)\
&=1 \rightarrow 0\
&=0\
&(4)(p \wedge q \wedge \urcorner r) \leftrightarrow ((\urcorner p \vee \urcorner q ) \rightarrow r)\
&=(1 \wedge 1 \wedge 1) \leftrightarrow ((0 \vee 0) \rightarrow 1)\
&=1 \leftrightarrow 1\
&=1

\end{align}
$$

2.1

pq$A=p \rightarrow q$$B=p \wedge \urcorner q$$\urcorner(A \vee B)$$\urcorner A \wedge \urcorner B $
001000
011000
100100
111000

2.5

$$
\begin {align}
&(1)(\urcorner p \rightarrow q ) \rightarrow (\urcorner q \vee p)\
&=(p \vee q) \rightarrow (\urcorner q \vee p )\
&=\urcorner(p \vee q) \vee (\urcorner q \vee p)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee (\urcorner q \vee p)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee (\urcorner q \wedge p) \vee (\urcorner q \wedge \urcorner p) \vee ( p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee ( p \wedge q)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee ( p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee ( p \wedge q)\
&= m_0 \vee m_2 \vee m_3\
&=\sum(0,2,3)\
&成真赋值为00，10，11\
&(2)(\urcorner p \rightarrow q ) \wedge (q \wedge r)\
&=(p \vee q) \wedge q \wedge r\
&=(p \wedge q \wedge r) \vee (q \wedge r)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge q \wedge r) \vee (p \wedge q \wedge r) \
&=m_3 \vee m_7\
&=\sum(3,7)\
&成真赋值为011,111\
&(3)(p \vee (q \wedge r)) \rightarrow (p \vee q \vee r)\
&=\urcorner (p \vee (q \wedge r)) \vee (p \vee q \vee r)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge \urcorner(q \wedge r))\vee (p \vee q \vee r)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge (\urcorner q \vee \urcorner r)) \vee (p \vee q \vee r)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee (\urcorner p \wedge\urcorner r)\vee (p \vee q \vee r)\
&=1\
&该式为重言式，成真赋值为000,001，010，011，100，101，110，111\
\end {align}
$$

2.18

$$
\begin {align}
&(1)p \vee \urcorner q \vee \ \urcorner r\
&=\urcorner (\urcorner p \wedge q) \vee \ \urcorner r\
&=\urcorner((\urcorner p \wedge q) \wedge r)\

&(2)(p \leftrightarrow r) \wedge q\
&=((p \wedge r) \vee (\urcorner p \wedge \urcorner r)) \wedge q\
&=\urcorner(\urcorner(p \wedge r) \wedge \urcorner(\urcorner p \wedge \urcorner r )) \wedge q\
&(3)(p \rightarrow (q \wedge r)) \vee p\
&=\urcorner p \vee(q \wedge r) \vee p \
&=\urcorner(p \wedge \urcorner(q \wedge r)) \vee p \
&=\urcorner((p \wedge \urcorner(q \wedge r)) \wedge \urcorner p)
\end {align}
$$

2.19

$$
\begin {align}
&(1)(\urcorner p \vee \urcorner q) \wedge r \
&=\urcorner(\urcorner (\urcorner p \vee \urcorner q) \vee \urcorner r))\
&(2)(p \rightarrow (q \wedge \urcorner p)) \wedge q \wedge r \
&=(\urcorner p \vee (q \wedge \urcorner p)) \wedge \urcorner(\urcorner q \vee \urcorner r)\
&=(\urcorner p \vee \urcorner(\urcorner q \vee p)) \wedge \urcorner(\urcorner q \vee \urcorner r)\
&=\urcorner(\urcorner(\urcorner p \vee \urcorner(\urcorner q \vee p)) \vee (\urcorner q \vee \urcorner r))\
&(3)p \wedge q \wedge \urcorner r\
&=\urcorner(\urcorner p \vee \urcorner q) \wedge \urcorner r\
&=\urcorner((\urcorner p \vee \urcorner q)\vee r )
\end {align}
$$

2.22

pq$p \uparrow q$$p \downarrow q$$(p \wedge \urcorner q) \vee(\urcorner p \wedge q)$$\urcorner(p \rightarrow q)$
001100
011010
101011
110000

$$
(1)F^{(2)}{14} ~~~ (2)F^{(2)}{8} ~~~ (3)F^{(2)}{6} ~~~ (4)F^{(2)}{2} ~~~
$$

2.26

$$
在C=0时,A \vee C \Leftrightarrow A \Leftrightarrow B \vee C \Leftrightarrow B,故A \Leftrightarrow B成立\
在C=1时，A \wedge C \Leftrightarrow A \Leftrightarrow B \wedge C \Leftrightarrow B,故A \Leftrightarrow B成立\
$$

2.27

$$
\begin {align}
&(1)(\urcorner p\wedge \urcorner q \wedge r) \vee ( \urcorner p\wedge q \wedge r) \vee (p\wedge \urcorner q \wedge \urcorner r) \vee (p\wedge q \wedge \urcorner r)\
&=m_1 \vee m_3 \vee m_4 \vee m_6 \
&=\sum(1,3,4,6)\
&(2)(\urcorner p\wedge \urcorner q \wedge r) \vee ( \urcorner p\wedge q \wedge r) \vee (p\wedge \urcorner q \wedge \urcorner r) \vee (p\wedge q \wedge \urcorner r)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge r) \vee (p \wedge \urcorner r)\
&=\urcorner(\urcorner(\urcorner p \wedge r) \wedge \urcorner (p \wedge \urcorner r)) \
&(3)(\urcorner p\wedge \urcorner q \wedge r) \vee ( \urcorner p\wedge q \wedge r) \vee (p\wedge \urcorner q \wedge \urcorner r) \vee (p\wedge q \wedge \urcorner r)\
&=(\urcorner p \wedge r) \vee (p \wedge \urcorner r)\
&=\urcorner(p \leftrightarrow r)
\end {align}
$$

2.29

设 p: 王小红为班长 q:李强为生活委员 r:丁金生为班长 s:王小红为生活委员 t: 李强为班长w:王小红为学习委员

由已知条件可得公式：
$$
T:(\urcorner p \wedge q) \vee (p \wedge \urcorner q)\
U:(\urcorner r \wedge s) \vee (r \wedge \urcorner s)\
W:(\urcorner t \wedge w) \vee (t \wedge \urcorner w)\
G \Leftrightarrow((\urcorner p \wedge q) \vee (p \wedge \urcorner q) )\wedge((\urcorner r \wedge s) \vee (r \wedge \urcorner s)) \wedge ((\urcorner t \wedge w) \vee (t \wedge \urcorner w))\
$$
由于p和r不同时为真，q和s不同时为真，s和w不同时为真。故上式变为：
$$
\begin {align}
&G \Leftrightarrow (\urcorner p \wedge q \wedge r \wedge \urcorner s )\wedge ((\urcorner t \wedge w) \vee (t \wedge \urcorner w)) \
&~~~\Leftrightarrow(\urcorner p \wedge q \wedge r \wedge \urcorner s \wedge \urcorner t \wedge w ) \vee (\urcorner p \wedge q \wedge r \wedge \urcorner s \wedge t \wedge \urcorner w )\
\end {align}
$$
由于p,r,t不同时为真，p,s,w不同时为，则上式为：
$$
G \Leftrightarrow (\urcorner p \wedge q \wedge r \wedge \urcorner s \wedge \urcorner t \wedge w)
$$
于是得到：王小红为学习委员，李强为生活委员 ，丁金生为班长 。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
